channel.title: New Shops
channel.description:
Hey just wondering how to put a whole new shop in.... i was looking round tuts and couldnt find one so ill post here i know how to put items in shops ect.... just gota know how to put a new shop in and position it
ty....

item.title: New Shops
item.dc:creator: @NojTB NojTB
item.description:
@NojTB wrote:

theres shop maker generator files that ya can use to make a txt file with instructions to add the shop ya just finished makin. should be in the tut forum somewere.

Read full topic

item.title: New Shops
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Just a sec, I’ll make a quick tutorial for you.

Ok, seeing as you have already added the items and all, I’ll skip the first part.

Ok, now open up autospawn.cfg. Find one of your other shop keepers, like Aubury. Press enter so that you are below it now. Add this:

spawn = NPCID	XCOORD	YCOORD	0	0	0	0	0	1	SHORT DESCRIPTION

Ok, now just fill in what needs to be changed. Now open up your client.java. Search for

WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop

Press enter so that you are below it. Then add this:

} else if (NPCID == IDOFNPC) { //SHOPNAME PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = ##; //SHOPNAME
Replace what needs to be replaced. DO NOT CHANGE NPCID JUST IDOFNPC. The ## is the shop number that you gave the shop in shops.cfg.

Now save, compile, and run

Read full topic

item.title: New Shops
item.dc:creator: @broony broony
item.description:
@broony wrote:

Couldn’t you just add a new shop keeper in?. For position just type in the co-ordinates of where you want it to go. Sorry I can’t be of more help. Im quite new to private servers.

-Broony
